attributes.action: hear us christians and take us seriously
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that the prime minister listen to this christian nation and stop any sort of orders were we are not allowed to carry on  being christians openley.we believe in God,the Father,the Son and the Holy spirit. we will Never  deny our Lord and we will speak,praise and teach about God always.we will never stop wearing our crucifixes and standing proud in the name of the Father,Son and Holy spirit.
May God Help us
Amen
